summary: Golax Connect - A modern web-based social media platform with Internet Identity authentication, one-way follow system, chronological news feed from followed users, posts with up to 5 images, likes, comments, user search, and profile management. Features a clean Facebook-like blue and white UI with top navigation, feed, profile, and search pages.
architectural_notes: Use Motoko backend on Internet Computer for all data storage
Store user profiles with name, bio, profile photo URL
Posts support up to 5 images per post
News feed queries posts from followed users only, sorted chronologically
Track follower and following counts for each user

existing_features.title: Implement Internet Identity authentication system allowing users to sign up and log in securely
Create user profile system with name, bio, and profile photo fields that can be set during initial profile creation
Allow users to update and change their profile photo anytime from their profile settings
Implement one-way follow system where users can follow anyone without approval, and unfollow anytime
Create post functionality allowing users to create posts with text content and upload up to 5 images per post
Implement chronological news feed showing posts in newest-first order exclusively from users that the current user follows, excluding posts from users they don't follow
Implement like and unlike functionality for posts
Implement comment system allowing users to comment on posts and view all comments on a post
Implement user search functionality allowing users to search for other users by name
Create profile page displaying profile photo, name, bio, followers count, following count, and a grid of the user's posts
Implement Facebook-like layout with top navigation bar, feed page, profile page, and search page
Apply modern blue and white professional social media design theme throughout the application
Display the platform name 'Golax Connect' consistently throughout the application including navigation bar and branding elements
Ensure the application is fully responsive and works well on both mobile and desktop devices

new_feature_requests.summary: Internet Identity authentication with profile setup (name, bio, profile photo)
Create posts with text and up to 5 images
Chronological news feed showing posts from followed users only (newest first)
Profile page with photo, name, bio, follower/following counts, and posts grid
Update profile photo anytime from profile settings
Facebook-like layout with top navigation bar, feed page, profile page, and search page
Modern blue and white professional social media design, responsive for mobile and desktop
